entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @POTUS Greatest loss of preventable lives. Keep boasting, lying, and urging people to use crap ideas as a defense against COVID19. You’re MAGAgting your way to the biggest grim reaper in history.
